review_data.content: Had dinner there in April, and really liked it. We had different starters, and the sashimi was great, the others were 'normal'. We went for the ramen soups as our main courses, and they were good. I've had the black sesame one, nice broth, and...More

review_data.title: Delicious!
review_data.content: I was not expecting to go to Zurich to eat ramen, but we were hungry and this place seemed to have decent reviews. When we got there, they told us that there were no tables available without a reservation, but we could sit at the...More

review_data.title: 3 times in a week
review_data.content: I live japanese food, especially when it is fresh and affordable. Went three days in the first week. Get the Ramen, probably the best I ever had, everything is made fresh.

review_data.title: Tolles Essen im kleinen Japanischen Lokal mitten in Zürich
review_data.content: Das Essen war sehr gut. Ungewöhnlich und sehr hochwertig, vor allem die Suppen mit den hausgemachten Nudeln. Wir waren begeistert.

review_data.title: The best ramen soup outside of Japan
review_data.content: I just had lunch here today with 2 business colleagues and as a result found my Stammrestaurant for lunch in Zürich. Phenomenal ramen soup, authentic ambiance, and happy, friendly service. Try the spicy black sesame ramen soup.

review_data.title: Not what we expected

review_data.title: Buono - tanto - e non caro (per Zurigo)

review_data.title: Top! Authentisch japanisch

review_data.title: Japaneese Pub with excellent Ramen
review_data.content: We visited the place on a Tuesday evening for dinner. Reservation on the phone worked out with no problems. The restaurant is small and kept in a simple Japanese style. Some tables spread along the room and a big bar on one side. Be aware,...More

review_data.title: Warm beer and cold service
review_data.content: They were probably quite busy that night, since the only free spot was at the bar. Maybe that's why service seemed quite uninterested, which was a bit of a shame. Pricey Japanese craft beer at 9 CHF a bottle, which regrettably was served only slightly...More

review_data.title: Good New Ramen Restaurant
review_data.content: They just opend recentely and for that everything was fine! The food was delicious huge bowls of ramen und the gyoza were good too. The service could improve be a bit more attentively but as the restaurant was fully booked it is understandable. Definitely recommendable...More

review_data.title: New Japanese Gem in the middle of Zurich
review_data.content: This Japanese ramen restaurant just opened on Monday, 06.02.2017. We reserved for the day after the offical opening and were not left disappointed. The service was impeccable!
